```{r setup}
library(treepplr)
library(ggplot2)
```

Run the `coin.tppl` TreePPL program using the created input data. 

```{r, eval=FALSE}

coinflips <- tibble(coinflips = sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), 20, replace = TRUE))

input <- treeppl_input(object_list = coinflips, file_path = "coin_input.json")

output <- run_treeppl(source = paste0(system.file("extdata", package = "treepplr"),"/coin.tppl"), 
                      data_path = input, samples = 10)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
output <- readRDS("coin_rdata/output.rds")
```

Plot the posterior distribution.

```{r}
if(rlang::is_installed("ggplot2")) {
  ggplot(output) +
  geom_col(aes(samples, nweights), width = 0.005) +
  theme_bw()
}
```
